end.title: Pleasantville
end.creator_credit: Gary Ross, Jon Kilik and Steven Soderbergh
end.brief_description: Geeky David and his popular twin Jennifer get sucked into a black-and-white 1950s TV sitcom world and find it anything but peachy keen. When Jennifer’s modern attitude disrupts Pleasantville’s peaceful but boring routine, she literally brings color into its life.
